data.Name: Sigil of Adjustment
data.Description: Choose 2 of 7 cards. Increase or decrease their rank by 1.

data.Name: Sigil of Ascent
data.Description: Choose 1 of 7 cards. Increase its rank by 2.

data.Name: Sigil of Echo
data.Description: Choose 1 of 7 cards. Duplicate it to another deck.

data.Name: Sigil of Erasure
data.Description: Choose 1 of 7 cards. Remove them permanently.

data.Name: Sigil of Collapse
data.Description: Remove 3 random cards from this deck.

data.Name: Sigil of Passage
data.Description: Choose 1 of 7 cards. Transfer it permanently to a chosen deck.

data.Name: Sigil of Migration
data.Description: Transfer 2 random cards from this deck to the other deck.

data.Name: Sigil of Alignment – Hearts
data.Description: Choose 2 of 7 cards. Convert them to Hearts.

data.Name: Sigil of Alignment – Spades
data.Description: Choose 2 of 7 cards. Convert them to Spades.

data.Name: Sigil of Alignment – Clubs
data.Description: Choose 2 of 7 cards. Convert them to Clubs.

data.Name: Sigil of Alignment – Diamonds
data.Description: Choose 2 of 7 cards. Convert them to Diamonds.
